title: Heteroatom-doped lignin-derived carbon material: performance and application
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1369-1388
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01590D, Review Article
Haiwei Guo, Tian Sun, Qiqi Yin, Xinyang Li, Zhao Chen, Xiaodong Ma
This review summarizes the influence of heteroatom-doping on the physicochemical properties of lignin-based carbon, together with its electro-chemical property in batteries and capacitors and adsorption ability for the removal of pollutants.
